main.node: Group Current vs Last Week Data

parameters.subject: =Your Property Marketing Performance for {{ $('Calculate Deltas & Icons').item.json.property_name }}

parameters.html:

nodes.name: Group Current vs Last Week Data

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  oms.property_id,
  oms.property_name,
  oms.owner_id,
  oms.owner_email,
  oms.guest_cards,
  oms.applications,
  oms.showings,
  oms.showings_cancelled,
  oms.lead_sources,
  oms.application_statuses,
  oms.week_ending
FROM owner_marketing_summary oms
JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT week_ending 
  FROM owner_marketing_summary 
  ORDER BY week_ending DESC 
  LIMIT 2
) recent_weeks ON oms.week_ending = recent_weeks.week_ending
ORDER BY oms.property_id, oms.week_ending DESC;
